title: High-precision interpolation of stellar atmospheres with a deep neural network using a 1D convolutional auto encoder for feature extraction. (arXiv:2306.06938v1 [astro-ph.IM])
abstract: Given the widespread availability of grids of models for stellar atmospheres, it is necessary to recover intermediate atmospheric models by means of accurate techniques that go beyond simple linear interpolation and capture the intricacies of the data. Our goal is to establish a reliable, precise, lightweight, and fast method for recovering stellar model atmospheres, that is to say the stratification of mass column, temperature, gas pressure, and electronic density with optical depth given any combination of the defining atmospheric specific parameters: metallicity, effective temperature, and surface gravity, as well as the abundances of other key chemical elements. We employed a fully connected deep neural network which in turn uses a 1D convolutional auto-encoder to extract the nonlinearities of a grid using the ATLAS9 and MARCS model atmospheres. translated_title: 用一维卷积自编码器进行特征提取，利用深度神经网络实现恒星大气高精度插值
translated_abstract: 鉴于恒星大气模型网格的广泛可用性，需要采用超越简单线性插值并捕捉数据的复杂性的准确技术，以通过精确技术恢复中间大气模型。我们的目标是建立一种可靠、精确、轻量级且快速的方法，用于恢复恒星模型大气，也就是质量柱、温度、气体压力和电子密度的分层，给出定义大气特定参数的任何组合：金属丰度、有效温度和表面重力，以及其他关键化学元素的丰度。我们采用了完全连接的深度神经网络，该神经网络使用一维卷积自编码器从ATLAS9和MARCS模型大气中提取非线性关系。这种称为iNNterpol的新方法有效考虑了数据关系中的非线性性，而不是传统方法。
tldr: 一种高效、准确、适用于恒星模型大气的插值方法，采用深度神经网络和一维卷积自编码器技术，能够提取非线性关系从而实现更加精细的预测。
en_tdlr: iNNterpol is a reliable, precise and fast method for recovering intermediate atmospheric models, which uses a fully connected deep neural network and a 1D convolutional auto-encoder to extract non-linear relationships and achieve more accurate predictions in the prediction of mass column, temperature, gas pressure, and electronic density with optical depth and abundances of chemical elements.
